entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening then light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
